every_video = {'id': 'A8WVGxXHUuU', 'publish_date': '2024-05-22 00:00:00', 'published': [], 'title': '香港优才移民计划有什么利弊吗？全方位分析', ...}
video_fullpath = '/home/runner/work/github-runner/github-runner/mypy/tests/apps/youtu2douyin/_out/channel_UC4cw8Y12uIvrh8eLwGA3n8A/A8WVGxXHUuU.mp4'
video_title = '香港优才移民计划有什么利弊吗？全方位分析'
gen = <generator object DatetimeUtil.random_time_generator at 0x7f7fb4ee3510>
first_video_published = [False], to_publish_platforms = ['douyin', 'wechat']
channel_pub_cfg = <mypy.lib.playwright.publish_config.PublishConfig object at 0x7f7fa7984820>
channel_cfg = {'channel_name': '', 'channel_url': '', 'enable': True, 'publish_cfg': {}, ...}
publish_cfg = {}
upload_record = {'channels': [{'channel_name': 'TED-Ed', 'channel_url': 'https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsooa4yRKGN_zEE8iknghZA', 'e...KRN/USRN学习资料', 'description': '#HKRN #护士懂护士 #护士长', 'latest_publish_time': '0512-1205', 'publish_mod': 'timing'}, ...}]}

    def _publish_video(self, every_video, video_fullpath, video_title, gen,
                       first_video_published, to_publish_platforms, channel_pub_cfg,
                       channel_cfg, publish_cfg, upload_record):
    
        LOG.debug('----- 视频信息: %s', every_video)
        publish_handler = PublishHandler(publish_files=video_fullpath,
                                         work_path=self._work_path)
    
        # 第一个视频立即发布，后续的再定时发布
        # first_video_published 有问题，上层是值传递的，每次到这里这个值都是 False
        # 现在改成 list 让他支持引用传递
        if Config.pulibsh_first_video_now and not first_video_published[0]:
            LOG.info('立即发布监控到的第一条视频《%s》', video_title)
            channel_pub_cfg.publish_mod = Const.PUBLISH_NOW
            channel_pub_cfg.publish_time = datetime.now()
            first_video_published[0] = True
        else:
            # 定时发布，获取下一个发布时间
            channel_pub_cfg.publish_mod = channel_cfg.get(
                'publish_mod', Const.PUBLISH_TIMING)
            channel_pub_cfg.publish_time = next(gen)
        # 设置发布标题（默认使用视频文件名作为标题）
        channel_pub_cfg.title = video_title
        channel_pub_cfg.to_platforms = to_publish_platforms
        # 返回个平台的发布结果, [['douyin', True, ''], ['wechat', False, 'exception']]
        publish_result = publish_handler.publish(channel_pub_cfg)
    
        publish_fail_cnt = 0
        for (platform, is_pub_ok, exp_msg) in publish_result:
            # 要求全平台都成功，否则抛异常
            if Config.assert_all_plt_success and not is_pub_ok:
                err_msg = f'要求全平台必须成功，但是发布到 [{platform}] 平台失败: {exp_msg}'
                raise Exception(err_msg)
    
            # 如果任一平台都没发布不成功，就要去解决问题，不用继续处理下一个发布了
            publish_fail_cnt += 0 if is_pub_ok else 1
            if publish_fail_cnt == len(to_publish_platforms):
                err_msg = f'所有待发布平台: {to_publish_platforms} 都没发布成功: {publish_result}'
>               raise Exception(err_msg)
E               Exception: 所有待发布平台: ['douyin', 'wechat'] 都没发布成功: [['douyin', False, 'can only concatenate str (not "NoneType") to str'], ['wechat', False, 'can only concatenate str (not "NoneType") to str']]
